comchisq=function(data){
  d=table(data,S)
  aaa=d[,4:5]
  dim(aaa)
  aaa=as.matrix(aaa)
  ff=rep(0,dim(aaa)[1])
  aaa=cbind(aaa,ff)
  for (i in 1:dim(aaa)[1]){
    aaa[i,3]=aaa[i,1]+aaa[i,2]
  }

  v=apply(X = aaa,MARGIN = 2,FUN = sum)

  g=0
  for (i in 1:dim(aaa)[1] ){
    for (j in 1:2){
      g=g+(aaa[i,j]-(aaa[i,3]+v[j]/v[3]))^2/(aaa[i,3]+v[j]/v[3])
    }
  } 
  k=c(g,dim(aaa)[1])
  return(k)
}
D=comchisq(DAD)
M=comchisq(MOM)


D
M
qchisq(p = 0.95,df = 134)
qchisq(p = 0.95,df = 236)
